host_venue.name: World Equestrian Center Ocala
host_venue.venue_snap: A grand-scale facility in Florida's horse country, blending marble stables and timeless arinas in a polished setting.
host_venue.venue_paragraph: The World Equestrian Center â€” Ocala is a luxurious equestrian complex spanning hundreds of acres of riding and an artistic design. Its interiors and outdoor arenas are built for professional shows, with clean stone surfaces, gratite viewing, and indoor spaces that maintain cool comfort even in summer heat.
host_venue.venue_hello: Welcome to the World Equestrian Center Ocala.
